sentence.Network_en: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.
sentence.Network_cn: 7我们要进他的居所,在他脚凳前下拜.

sentence.Network_en: And he used the extinct volcano as a footstool.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且,他还把那座死火山当作脚凳.

sentence.Network_en: Henceforth waiting until His enemies are made the footstool for His feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 13从此等候?的仇敌,放在?的脚下作脚凳.

with the lower back and pelvic pain , try using a footstool to keep your feet slightly raised off floor .在腰痛或骨盆疼痛时，尝试使用脚凳保持双脚稍稍抬离地面。

entry.def: A footstool is a small low stool that you can rest your feet on when you are sitting in a chair.

means.word_mean: 1. a low stool to rest the feet of a seated person
